product_name: The North Face Printed Resolve Rain Jacket - Girls'
long_description: The North Face Printed Resolve rain jacket for girls provides waterproof and breathable protection in eye-catching style for outdoor adventures in wet weather. Polyester shell with 2-layer HyVent (TM) coating and sealed seams is strong, light, windproof, waterproof and breathable. Mesh lining wicks moisture away from the skin to keep your child warm and comfortable. Ergonomic hood tucks away into collar. Brushed collar lining and chin guard offer soft, moisture-wicking comfort. The North Face Printed Resolve jacket features zippered hand pockets and an ID label. Elasticized cuffs and rip-and-stick stormflap over the full-length zipper help seal out rain and wind.
short_description: The North Face Printed Resolve rain jacket for girls provides waterproof and breathable protection in eye-catching style for outdoor adventures in wet weather.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
